import React from "react"; import Player from "./components/Player/Player"; const App = ({ player1, player2, handleP1Increment, handleP2Increment, handleReset, p1Serving, winner }) => ( {/* header */}

PongPing

{/* scores */} {/*
Player 1

{player1}

Player 2

{player2}

*/} {winner > 0 ? (

Player {winner} wins!

) : null}
{ /* reset button */} ); export default App;
